radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple gallstones and gallbladder sludge identified. There is irregular gallbladder wall contour with pericholecystic fluid identified, concerning for perforated gallbladder. The gallbladder wall is also thickened up to 6 mm.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen/pelvis w/o contrast
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cholelithiasis and trace free fluid within the pelvis.
